body.name: ALSEYE M120D Plus CPU Air Cooler, Temperature Displayed CPU Cooler Comes with Dual ARGB & PWM 120mm Max Series Fans, Compatible with Intel LGA1700 /1200 /115X /2011/2066 /1366 and AMD AM4/AM5 (White)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 4 hrs 25 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 4 hrs 25 mins
features: ALSEYE creatively adds a temperature display on the air-cooled CPU cooler, which can intuitively read the accurate CPU temperature in real-time by our own software “BEM”.
The cooler cover and the fans on the radiator come with led lights that support aura sync ARGB light effects and you could freely define your favorite dazzling light effects.

M120D Plus CPU cooler comes with 6 units of 6mm copper bottom soldered heat conduction copper pipes, which can quickly conduct CPU heat, and are equipped with dual 120mm PWM fans to quickly dissipate heat.

There are only two screws needed to firmly fix the CPU cooler on the MB, and the installation steps are simple and quick. The package comes with installation accessories and tools, as well as detailed installation instructions with illustrations. Drop test, if the cooler has been installed well and tightly, the CPU cooler will not be tilted and will not cause damage to the CPU while the case falls from 1.5 meters during transportation.

M120D Plus is compatible with Intel LGA 1700/1200/1150/1151/1155/1156/1366/2011/2066 and AMD AM4/AM5 dual platform. (Notice: There is a detailed installation video of M120D Plus on the ALSEYE YouTube channel.) Feel free to contact us if you met any trouble with installation and use.
body.description: Accurate CPU Temperature Display After two years of scientific research breakthroughs, through our self-developed software "BEM", the M120D Plus CPU cooler can accurately display the CPU temperature in real-time. Powerful CPU fans and special industrial design provide M120D Plus ultra-high heat dissipation performance. Please note that if the CPU cooler continues to display 24 degrees Celsius, please check whether the USB cable of the CPU cooler is properly connected to the motherboard or whether the "BEM" software is running.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The "BEM" software Please follow the instruction to download and install the software "BEM" from our Brand website after installation of the cooler. Please set the "BEM" software to start automatically after the installation. Software can be hided in the background. In this way, the CPU temperature can be displayed on the cooler when the PC is turned on. Accurate CPU Temperature Display After two years of scientific research breakthroughs, through our self-developed software "BEM", the M120D Plus CPU cooler can accurately display the CPU temperature in real-time. Powerful CPU fans and special industrial design provide M120D Plus ultra-high heat dissipation performance. Please note that if the CPU cooler continues to display 24 degrees Celsius, please check whether the USB cable of the CPU cooler is properly connected to the motherboard or whether the "BEM" software is running.

ARGB Light Effect The main body and the fans of the CPU cooler are all built-in with the ARGB led lights. M120D Plus supports aura sync ARGB light effects adjust. It supports synchronize the cooler's light effects with other ARGB-enabled devices in the chassis. You could freely defines favorite dazzling light effects for your PC case. ARGB Light Effect The main body and the fans of the CPU cooler are all built-in with the ARGB led lights. M120D Plus supports aura sync ARGB light effects adjust. It supports synchronize the cooler's light effects with other ARGB-enabled devices in the chassis. You could freely defines favorite dazzling light effects for your PC case. ARGB Light Effect The main body and the fans of the CPU cooler are all built-in with the ARGB led lights. M120D Plus supports aura sync ARGB light effects adjust. It supports synchronize the cooler's light effects with other ARGB-enabled devices in the chassis. You could freely defines favorite dazzling light effects for your PC case. ARGB Light Effect The main body and the fans of the CPU cooler are all built-in with the ARGB led lights. M120D Plus supports aura sync ARGB light effects adjust. It supports synchronize the cooler's light effects with other ARGB-enabled devices in the chassis. You could freely defines favorite dazzling light effects for your PC case.

Built-in dual M120-P ARGB&PWM Fans ARGB Supported The RGB lighting can be synchronized with the 5V addressable motherboard and can be easily installed by connecting the standard 5V 3PIN RGB header to the Motherboard ARGB header. It allows you to adjust your prefer rgb lighting effect with your mind. PWM Supported It can automatically adjust the fan speed to meet system cooling demands. The M120-P fan allows dynamic speed adjustments between 700 and 1,900 revolutions per minute to minimize noise or maximize airflow. Fans Specification & Details Fan Dimensions: 120×120×25mm Fan Speed（Front）: 700~1900R.P.M.±10% Fan Airflow（Front）: 27.18~73.76CFM±10% Fan Air Pressure（Front）: 0.29~2.15mmH20±10% Fan Noise（Front）: 18.5~38.2dB(A)±10% Fan Airflow（Back）: 21.50~52.22CFM±10% Fan Air Pressure（Back）: 0.22~1.41mmH20±10% Fan Noise（Back）: 14.2~34.8dB(A)±10%

Easy installation Steps M120D Plus CPU Cooler adopts ALSEYE's unique buckle design, which simplifies installation steps, even beginners can easily get started. There are more detail installation instruction on the user manual. The height of M120D Plus CPU cooler is 160mm(6.3inch). Please make sure that your chassis has enough space to accommodate the cooler before your purchase. There are more detail installation instruction on the user manual. The height of M120D Plus CPU cooler is 160mm(6.3inch). Please make sure that your chassis has enough space to accommodate the cooler before your purchase. Easy installation Steps M120D Plus CPU Cooler adopts ALSEYE's unique buckle design, which simplifies installation steps, even beginners can easily get started. There are more detail installation instruction on the user manual. The height of M120D Plus CPU cooler is 160mm(6.3inch). Please make sure that your chassis has enough space to accommodate the cooler before your purchase. Before installing the cooler main body, please peel off the base protective film and apply silicone grease on the CPU surface. Otherwise, the CPU cooler will not work properly. When you fix the radiator body on the base fastener, please align one screw first and then turn it 3-4 turns, then adjust the radiator and turn the other screw 3-4 turns. Then tighten the two screws separately. Be careful not to use too much force. Easy installation Steps M120D Plus CPU Cooler adopts ALSEYE's unique buckle design, which simplifies installation steps, even beginners can easily get started. There are more detail installation instruction on the user manual. The height of M120D Plus CPU cooler is 160mm(6.3inch). Please make sure that your chassis has enough space to accommodate the cooler before your purchase.
Compatible with Intel and AMD Dual Platform Intel: LGA115X/ 1366/ 2011/ 1200/ 1700(Support Intel 12th/13th Generation Core Processor) AMD: AM4/AM5

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ALSEYE M1200D PLUS CPU AIR COOLING FOR THE LITTLE GUYS
reviews.reviewText: What an Awesome Product! Beats air cooling from the older days hands down. Listen up, know your CPU model first, they all vary in power, then you will know if this will do the job needed. If you're overclocking it should be well known you need water cooling for lower temps, this big baby is easy to install and yes it has 4 wires to connect, two for fans, 1 for USB mother board spot for software to talk and 1 SATA power for RGB and power. This is a great product well done. By the way, large case not included ....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Temperature display works fine for me
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Temperature seems to be working fine for me. With a few seconds of delay. But I don't know if the one with the delay is the HWINFO software or the CPU Cooler display.(BTW I recorded this while running VR Chat on a valve index, and the CPU is a 13700KF.)Others are complaining that it shows random temperatures. You need to have it connected correctly to the motherboard and you need to have the software/drivers for this cooler installed.This Cooler has good and bright ARGB lights but the motherboard you have, could be limiting it's LED functionality. I have an ASRock motherboard with polychrome sync and there are not that many modes that I can choose from.If there was a software or an external controller with a button or something to help those with bad motherboards, that would make this product even better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cools and looks cool with excellent post sales support
reviews.reviewText: First off, this cooler has one of the best esthetics out there with just the right amount of leds in the right places for my taste. If you are building comp where you can see the components, obviously you want it to look cool. It also does a great job of cooling for and works will with my ROG Strix B550-F. It is crowding 1 of the 4 rams slots, but I am only running 2 16gig sticks so there was plenty of room for me. I chose not to install the software that displays accurate temperatures since I already have monitoring and would be doing so just for the display. The sticker is slightly off center, but I can pull it off and re-center if it truly bothers me later.I did have my first one screw up and the fan cracked on the hub, which deteriorated rapidly to the point I had to remove the unit and replace it with my Wraith so that I could continue to work. It was past the 30 day point too, so I really didnt expect much when I contacted the seller about it. To my delight, they responded quickly, asked for a picture of the broken fan and then sent me a replacement at lighting speed! Ive had the replacement for a few months now and it has been awesome with no issues.All in all, its a great product at a fair price and excellent support. I would not hesitate to purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Looks great but poor quality
reviews.reviewText: This is a huge fan and it does look great. I love the temperature display (you have to download additional software to use) and the RGB is great also, but one of the fans on my unit is not mounted properly in the assembly which causes it to rub against the fan case. At low speeds it is not a big deal, but when the rpm's rise, it steadily gets louder and more annoying. I put a lot of money into upgrading my computer and should not have skimped on the fan. I guess this is just a good excuse to get a watercooler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty awesome...only one flaw
reviews.reviewText: This cooler was very easy to install with the nice screwdriver they included as well as all the other necessary hardware. Also included was a nice big tube of thermal paste with a spreader(spatula).It looks amazing but please beware and make sure your pc case will have enough room for this beast. You'll have to download software to get the sensor to read out anything different than the 24° it says by default but that was pretty easy to do. One minor complaint is the temperature it displays is usually about 6° lower than the cpu temp being reported by the actual pc. That is a minor flaw but whatever it says on the display just add around 6° and it'll still be nice and cool. Very nice cooler. I'd definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The instructions aren’t quite as clear as they could be.
reviews.reviewText: Generally, the instructions index aren’t as clear as they need to be, but they were good.Product is excellent!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Digital Display is inaccurate
reviews.reviewText: The Pro's - looks good and cools the CPUThe CON's - digital display is inaccurate ranging from 10 to 15 degrees.Shipping? If you want this cooler you might want to order it for your next build not the current build....it might arrive for that build down the road. It said in stock which to me means its already manufactured and ready to ship. I truly believe they had to go and dig up the rare earth minerals and then make the thing prior to shipping it to me.I'll never buy this cooler brand again !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great. What the instructions don't tell you is that you have to plug the USB cable into your Motherboard or the display will NOT display the correct temp or will it change. I really wish they would have NOTED that in this ad beforehand. I was all ready using the 2 USB places on my Motherboard. Only shows 3 wires to hook up, but there is actually 4.
Bajan mucho las temperaturas, y su display te tiene cubierto, sencillo para saber que tan caliente esta, todo funcional pero si advierto que su instalacion es in caos, muy dificil a mi parecer.

Je recommande ce heatsink, il bloque deux port de Ram mais il es efficace et vue qu'il donne la température c'est vraiment cool et pratique! Pour que la température affiche il faut que la plug USB soit connecté et télécharger un ptit software "BEM" de leur compagnie, et ça fonctionne super bien apres, sinon c'est toujours écrit 24°C dessus! (Merci au vendeur pour le dépannage)

reviews.reviewTitle: Great looking and beautiful lighting effects
reviews.reviewText: Great product. You have to read and follow all the instructions. Others say it just reads 24 degrees all the time. On the last page of the instructions it requests you to download the operating software and then it will give proper readings. I did that and then it is working fine. There is also 4 wires to connect up. I am very happy with it. Looks better than Cooler Master which is a very good product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works well but temp guage doesnt work.
reviews.reviewText: I actually was impressed with this cooler paired with my Intel 12700KF. was kind of disapointed that the temp gauge didn't actually work. The page i ordered this from says i needed a program from their website to make it work or else it would only read 24°c (which it did) I installed the app it told me to install and it then it only reads 99°c.... my Asus software tells me it was at 5°c for first 5 min on idle then remains at 28-35 after a slight work load for 10 mins and back to idle. And under a benchmark test it peaked at 62°c 3 times in a row with the Asus extream overclock setting set. then back down to 30-33°c when test ended in 4 seconds. Pretty impressive imo. Cpu Chip got a 22176 rating on Cinabench for multithreading. all in all cooler looks nice with the ARGB lighing controlled with the mobo and works way better then expected for heat dissipation. The only down fall for me was temp gauge is pointless and completely inaccurate. This cooler was super easy to install (For me), i really had no issues with it and didn't even need to use the instructions hardly. It is a very heavy cooler just so you are aware, but it seems to sit in the case nice and snug. The ram i chose would not allow for me to fit 4 sticks in but some of the smaller may fit. I used Arctic thermal past instead of what it came with because i had a large tube of it already open, unsure if this made any sort of difference but it is possible i guess. I would only recommend this cooler to people for its looks, if you want an accurate temp gauge and that's a big deal for you get something else. Ill probably pull this out and swap it out for an Arctic Freezer 50 3 fan in the not too distant future.EDIT:Been reading some of the reviews that have popped up since i purchased and since i got the PC all up and running. Sadly, my last part was my power supply and took too long for any sort of return to be available for this component in my case. When it arrived it was not boxed in any way like most amazon purchases i got in past but non the lest was was sealed in film wrap and box was in great shape. (forgot to mention that before as i seen some people arrived in poor condition) PC has been running more or less non store for a few weeks now with 0 issues yet. Fingers crossed until i can afford some changes. I guess i wasn't too descriptive, Ive installed many coolers in past so this was pretty straight forward for me and it was similar to one other i used a few years back (where i had to remove a face plate to access 2 screw down points) I'm still sort of torn as this cooler ARGB looks wonderful with most of my build minus the case RGB fans and LED.. that's an easy fix to make correct and doesn't have anything to do with the cooler itself. Seems some people have got lemons in the mail and for you i feel terrible, i was very lucky to get a good specimen. it will do fine until i can A) Decide what i want instead and B) save up to get something else.ReEdit:Ouf tried a hard temp test program and this did not perform well at all!!!! hit 88°c ouch but that's an extreme testing program called Prime85 which i don't trying recommend with this thing. i had to know though. didn't wanna cool down till i restarted PC too. not good.

reviews.reviewTitle: Todo Hiba bien asta que la prendí y la temperatura marcaba 24°
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. El problema se soluciona instalado el softwareTambien probé con lo que dicen que el ventilador es un poquito grande y queda un poco desviada la ram, más bien está un poquito más gruesa la goma que trae el ventilador quitando está gomita no ahí ningún problema o desgastando está gomita
